entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:44 a.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Smoke. High 22.
entry.summary: Widespread smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 22. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Smoke. Low 9.
entry.summary: Widespread smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Widespread smoke. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
